description: ServersTransportSpec options to configure communication between Traefik and the servers.

disableHTTP2.description: Disable HTTP/2 for connections with backend servers.

forwardingTimeouts.description: Timeouts for requests forwarded to the backend servers.

dialTimeout.description: The amount of time to wait until a connection to a backend server can be established. If zero, no timeout exists.

idleConnTimeout.description: The maximum period for which an idle HTTP keep-alive connection will remain open before closing itself.

responseHeaderTimeout.description: The amount of time to wait for a server's response headers after fully writing the request (including its body, if any). If zero, no timeout exists.

maxIdleConnsPerHost.description: If non-zero, controls the maximum idle (keep-alive) to keep per-host. If zero, DefaultMaxIdleConnsPerHost is used.

peerCertURI.description: Defines the URI used to match against SAN URIs during the server's certificate verification.

rootCAsSecrets.description: Add cert file for self-signed certificate.

serverName.description: ServerName used to contact the server.

title: Servers Transport
